biotools.summary: Free web tool that allow end users to explore the human and mouse gene regulatory networks. Users can query the system by providing a gene identifier and the boundaries of the subnetwork being explored. The system provides the list of interactions, the enriched Gene Ontology Terms together with a graphical representation of the subnetwork.

bioschemas.name: Netview
